div.p: Guidance sent to families from KIPP ENC regarding school closures, remote learning, and health updates pertaining to COVID-19.

main.h4: The mission of KIPP ENC is to empower all of our students with the skills, knowledge and character necessary to succeed in the colleges of their choice, strengthen their community, and fight for social justice.

div.h3: Donate to the KIPP ENC Annual Fund Today!

div.h4: With your help, our students will make the world a better place.
div.p: The KIPP ENC Annual Fund provides yearly support for each school in areas of greatest need. Your gift will help support all our students across our six campuses in Gaston, Halifax, and Durham as they journey to and through college. With your help, KIPP ENC will continue to prove that demography does not define destiny.

h5.a: Read about KIPP ENC’s Impact and History in The 74

li.p: “Six years after KIPP Gaston College Prep graduated its first class in the one-stoplight town of Gaston, North C… Read More

h5.a: Author Melanie Goolsby Visits KIPP Halifax

li.p: On Saturday, February 23rd, students and families from KIPP Halifax Primary school had the pleasure of meeting a… Read More

div.p: Join the movement that is revolutionizing education in Northeastern North Carolina. KIPP ENC is transforming the lives of students by preparing them for success in college and the world beyond. KIPP ENC has proven that demography does not define destiny.

to be a student for the
2020-21 school year!
